subject: Order #SSN4755
description_text:
Hello,
Regarding my order #SSN4755: I just wanted to ask if there is an estimated
time for when my order will be shipped? I am fully aware that it will take
longer than expected because of the holidays and I am still waiting on the
rig so it does not matter, but would there be any chance that I can get an
estimated arrival date? I would need to organize for someone to be home to
receive it.

Kind regards,

Noah Dekeyser

conversations.body_text: Hi Noah D,      We apologize for not updating you promptly about the shipment. Your package has been delivered. Have you received it?    https://www.dhl.de/en/privatkunden/pakete-empfangen/verfolgen.html?piececode=00340434776544042577&cid=c_dhl_2502061_2353

Hello,

no worries, I have received my package. Could not try it out yet, but first
impressions are really good. Manufacturing wise its perfect  ?



support@simsonn.com
